content: Is there a sign-up sheet for the upcoming connectathon in Baltimore? (...where to put name, contact, server URLs etc)
@David Hay @Sandra Vance ?
Hi Michele - thanks for the reminder! We'll be putting up an instance of conMan for this purpose - I'll get on to it in the next day of so and put the url here...
Thanks @David Hay (conman - that's an interesting name...)
